verse:
क्षरं प्रधानममृताक्षरं हरः क्षरात्मानावीशते देव एकः।
तस्याभिध्यानाद्योजनात्तत्त्वभावात्‌ भूयश्चान्ते विश्वमायानिवृत्तिः॥

terms.योजनात्(yojanat): mind can meditate on him without any effort, automatically
terms.विश्वमाया (vishvamaya): from the illusion of the world

meaning: The perishable and the immortal is ruled by one divine Lord. Practicing meadidating on him and then able to meditate on him without any effort and then realizing him will liberate you from the illusion of the world
